Package cr.ac.tec.ce3104.modes

Class PlayerStanding

java.lang.Object
cr.ac.tec.ce3104.modes.PlayerStanding
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableMode, Mode
public class PlayerStanding
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllableMode

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlayerStanding​(HorizontalDirection direction)
    Creates a new mode for the player which indicates that the player's avatar is immobile
